scripts.reference: docker-compose exec mediawiki ./update-mediawiki.sh && docker-compose run pixel reference --config backstop.config.js
scripts.test: docker-compose run pixel test --config backstop.config.js && app/backstop_data/html_report/index.html; open app/backstop_data/html_report/index.html
scripts.db:save: docker run --rm -v pixel_dbdata:/var/lib/mysql -v $(pwd)/backups:/backups ubuntu tar cvfz /backups/database_$(date '+%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S%z(%Z)').tar.gz var/lib/mysql
